sentences.sContent: He swished the tops off weeds with a sickle.
sentences.sContent_eng: He swished the tops off weeds with a sickle.
sentences.sCn: 他挥动镰刀嗖嗖地割掉了杂草的草尖。

sentences.sContent: Family history. If your family has a history of an inherited anemia, such as sickle cell anemia, you also may be at increased risk of the condition.
sentences.sContent_eng: Family history. If your family has a history of an inherited anemia, such as sickle cell anemia, you also may be at increased risk of the condition.
sentences.sCn: 家族史如果你有亲人患有遗传性的贫血，比如镰刀细胞性贫血，那么你患有这种贫血的风险也会比一般人高。

sentences.sContent: The flag flutters everywhere, beside red banners with the hammer and sickle, a reminder that the country is one of the last to uphold Marxist values.
sentences.sContent_eng: The flag flutters everywhere, beside red banners with the hammer and sickle, a reminder that the country is one of the last to uphold Marxist values.
sentences.sCn: 国旗各处飘扬，伴随着印有镰刀斧头的红色横幅，提醒人们，这是最后一个坚持马克思主义价值观的国家。

trans.tranOther: a tool with a blade in the shape of a hook, used for cutting wheat or long grass
